Package org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowNativeHardwareRenderer

java.lang.Object
org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowNativeHardwareRenderer
@Implements(value=android.graphics.HardwareRenderer.class, minSdk=29, looseSignatures=true, shadowPicker=Picker.class, callNativeMethodsByDefault=true) public class ShadowNativeHardwareRenderer extends Object
Shadow for HardwareRenderer that is backed by native code
